UniprotID	Q9UM44
Accession	Q9UM44;B4DKN2;D3DN60;Q9NWQ6
EntryName	HHLA2_HUMAN
ProteinName	HERV-H LTR-associating protein 2 (Human endogenous retrovirus-H long terminal repeat-associating protein 2)
GeneName	HHLA2
Length	414
Function	Through interaction with TMIGD2, costimulates T-cells in the context of TCR-mediated activation. Enhances T-cell proliferation and cytokine production via an AKT-dependent signaling cascade.
Subcellular Location	Membrane
